messages.subject: RE: Barnes and Noble Discounts
messages.msgSnippet: Courtney, I know of a site where folks post rebate info, special deals and reward sites: www.mycoupons.com Also, I ve gotten Toys R Us gift certificates, movie
messages.messageBody:
Courtney,

I know of a site where folks post rebate info, special deals and reward
sites: www.mycoupons.com

Also, I've gotten Toys R Us gift certificates, movie coupons, Macy gift
certificates, etc. for "free" by joining "reward" sites. Basically, you
click on banner ads and receive points. Once you receive a certain number of
points, you exchange them for gift certificates. If you're interested in
those, I can send you my favorites.

If you're wary of "cookies," etc. - these sites do track what you're doing.
I've also had to watch myself, 'cause it's very easy to spend too much time
on this stuff. It's not really free because you're exchanging your time to
get these items.

Nancy

Visit our Web Site!
http://www.FUN-Books.com
